text: Monserrato (Paùli) is a town and comune (municipality) in the Metropolitan City of Cagliari in Sardinia, Italy. As of 2016, 19,965 people lived there. Its area is 6.43 km². It is 8 meters above sea level. == References == == Other websites == * Category:Communes of the Metropolitan City of Cagliari
title: Monserrato
